rules: Rule1: Either raw material batch 001 passes quality control testing or raw material batch 002 passes quality control testing
Rule2: If the sterilization cycle is completed, then should the final product batch not be released to market, the raw material supply is not contaminated
Rule3: If the active pharmaceutical ingredient meets specifications, then the final product batch is released to market
Rule4: If the excipient blend meets specifications, then the final product batch is released to market
Rule5: If the supplier certification is verified, then the active pharmaceutical ingredient meets specifications
Rule6: Either the supplier certification is verified or the stability data is confirmed
Rule7: If environmental monitoring is documented, then under the condition that stability data is confirmed, the excipient blend meets specifications
Rule8: If the packaging material is compliant, then the final product batch is released to market
Rule9: If the labeling material is compliant, then the final product batch is released to market
Rule10: If the batch record is reviewed, then either the packaging material is compliant or the labeling material is compliant
Rule11: Either the batch record is reviewed or the manufacturing process is audited
Rule12: If the manufacturing process is audited, then either the packaging material is compliant or the labeling material is compliant
Rule13: If raw material batch 002 passes quality control testing, then the final product batch is released to market
Rule14: Either the potency assay is tested or the physical properties are tested
Rule15: If the physical properties are tested, then the excipient blend meets specifications
Rule16: If corrective action is implemented, then the root cause is not identified
Rule17: Either the primary packaging is inspected or the secondary packaging is inspected
Rule18: If the secondary packaging is inspected, then the labeling material is compliant
Rule19: If a regulatory audit is scheduled, then quality regulatory affairs is notified
Rule20: If the compliance dossier is prepared, then under the condition that primary packaging is inspected, the packaging material is compliant
Rule21: If quality regulatory affairs is notified, then the compliance dossier is prepared
Rule22: Either the impurity level exceeds specification threshold or the production line does not require investigation
Rule23: Either the quality manager approves the deviation or if the impurity level exceeds specification threshold, then the final product batch triggers rejection
Rule24: If the analytical instrument is calibrated, then the test method is validated
Rule25: If the test method is validated, then the final product batch is released to market
Rule26: Should it not be the case that if raw material batch 001 passes quality control testing then the final product batch is released to market, then the production line requires investigation
Rule27: If it is not true that testing the potency assay leads to the active pharmaceutical ingredient meeting specifications, then the root cause is identified
Rule28: If it is not true that testing the potency assay leads to the active pharmaceutical ingredient meeting specifications, then corrective action is implemented
Rule29: If the final product batch is not released to market, then the raw material supply is contaminated
facts: Fact1: The sterilization cycle is completed
Fact3: A regulatory audit is scheduled
Fact4: The analytical instrument is calibrated
Fact5: The final product batch does not trigger rejection
Fact6: The quality manager does not approve the deviation

question: The final product batch is released to market
